# Training points for mapping biomes

## Backgrounds

This script explains steps used to produce a compilation of training points to 
map global biomes. These steps are also explained in detail in @hengl2018global. 
The biomes data set is also explained in detail in @bonannella2023biomes.

## Processing steps

```{r essds-biomes, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="ARD training points for mapping biomes.", out.width="100%"}
knitr::include_graphics("images/pnv_biomes.pnts_sites.png")
```
